alert.note: Alert for Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 7:25PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN QUAY COUNTY THROUGH 800 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nara Visa. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Quay County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
